CustomField.description:
Brief description of the transaction being contemplated. Remember this is not a credit committee meeting.
For Type 3 and 4 transactions only, the 1-page Annexure may be used to provide additional information associated with the risk and complexity of the transaction. Additional information or submissions exceeding the 1 page will not be accepted.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Transaction Overview. Concise overview of the business/sector the Client is involved in. No more than 4 lines to be provided.
CustomField.label: Transaction Description
